DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study aim investigate anti-HPA antibody cause neonatal alloimmune thrombocytopenia Chinese pregnant woman . The survey data collect help form appropriate clinical screening procedure
DOC.brief_title: Study Anti-HPA Antibodies Caused Neonatal Alloimmune Thrombocytopenia Chinese Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: 1228 week pregnant Chinese woman Jan 1 , 2017 Dec 31 , 2018 Not willing participate study Plan terminate pregnancy early
